patthana15.42:1.1: Cittasaṃsaṭṭhaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nacittasaṃsaṭṭho nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā ekaṃ …pe… avigate ekaṃ.
patthana15.42:2.1: Cittasaṃsaṭṭhaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nacittasaṃsaṭṭho naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā ekaṃ …pe… avigate ekaṃ. (Abyākatamūlaṃ tīṇiyeva paccayavasena.)
